hello, which port do I need to forward f: rdesktop is a client. You shouldn't need to forward any port. On the server side, you will need to open a port depending on what you are using (Windows Terminal Services, etc.)
so If im going to connect to my friend windows pc to help him, im the one that has to open the port?
No, he does. He's running the server. Check the documentation for remote desktop in Windows.
